title: The teaser for WW? is it really for ww? Theory
body: It might not be ww but the taking of ww and combining it with urgot!!!!!!! that would be cool

replies.body:
It is obviously WW because of the fact that it is a singed lore rework. Singed original fed WW a potion and turned him into a warewolf, now they are changing it to be more of a augmented experiment on the body. Both end with his lab getting trashed, and the claws reveal everything. Plus, they never delete a champion or make skins based on the original lore. So that is impossible.

Also the pictures and description highly resemble Warwick.
